title: YouTube shooter accused firm of discrimination
text:
YouTube shooter accused firm of discrimination 6:54am EDT - 01:25 
More information is emerging of the woman identified by police as the attacker who wounded three people at YouTube's headquarters in California on Tuesday. Her online profile suggests she was a vegan blogger who accused the video-sharing service of discriminating against her.
